subject: Colleges and Universities
Brain
Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Researchers at U.C.L.A. hope a new test will help them find degenerative brain disease among former football players who are still alive. But experts say claims of the tests’ validity are premature.
snippet: Researchers at U.C.L.A. hope a new test will help them find degenerative brain disease among former football players who are still alive. But experts say claims of the tests’ validity are premature.
